ygData.subject: Hero Bracers
ygData.msgSnippet: Minor quest spoiler below..... I recently acquired a nice set of Mino Hero shackles, and I was wondering if anyone here has done the Hero Bracers quest.  I ask
ygData.messageBody:
Minor quest spoiler below.....


















I recently acquired a nice set of Mino Hero shackles, and I was
wondering if anyone here has done the Hero Bracers quest. I ask because
the descriptions of this quest on several web pages say it is for Human
Steel Warriors only. But I have never found a quest that couldn't be
done with suitable faction adjustments (via Carrillion). Luckily, I am
a half elf (one of the races allowed to use the bracer according to the
item description). Also, can you do it without doing the first part of
the quest? Or is that required as is implied by the quest descriptions?

Laluni Songhammer, Level 29 bard of E'Ci.

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
